page.title: 13A Day in The Life of ...
page.content: Morning starts with the alarm ringing at 7:00am. Breakfast consists of a bowl of Kellogs Cornflakes and two pieces of toast and marmalade.I usually arrive at school at about 8:15am and start to prepare for the days work.I have 10 minutes play ground duty to do before school starts at 9:00am.As there is not ridgedly set timetable each morning is different though work in maths and language is done.Dinner at 12:00am allows for some time to relax and prepare for the afternoon.School finishes at 3:30pm for the children but I usually stay to about 5:30 marking work,running clubs,putting up displays and preparing for the next day.As my wife also teaches both of us are involved in getting dinner.The rest of the evening is taken up with school meetings,work or relaxing.
